Max Ma - The Essentials

Hi, I'm Max. Welcome to my blog!

I'm a quant based in Toronto, currently focusing on algorithmic trading. I graduated with degrees in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science back in 2019. The human world evolves exponentially, but I started feeling lost and stuck at the beginning of 2022, so I decided to write to be focused. This blog intends to record my journey for being a quant, and I will publish my "essential" notes on different topics here for future reference.
